original_text: You shall season all your grain offerings with salt. You shall not let the salt of the covenant with your God be missing from your grain offering; with all your offerings you shall offer salt.
korean_text: 네 모든 소제물에 소금을 치라 네 하나님의 언약의 소금을 네 소제에 빼지 못할지니 네 모든 예물에 소금을 드릴지니라

sentences.original_text: You shall season all your grain offerings with salt.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 네 모든 곡물 제물에 소금을 치라.

sentences.original_text: You shall not let the salt of the covenant with your God
be missing from your grain offering;
sentences.korean_translation: 네 곡물 제물에서 없어지게 하지 말라.

sentences.original_text: with all your offerings you shall offer salt.
